In the southern five heavens of JambudvÄ«pa,
The Chu people live there.
The land is over 90,000 li in circumference.
It borders the great ocean on three sides and the snow mountains on the north.
There is no universal monarch to rule over it.
It is divided into over seventy countries in the middle.
The general name is the five regions of India.
It is also called Sindhu.
Some call it India.
It is also called Greater Xia.
The people are distant descendants of BrahmÄ.
